      • uniqueSolution

        public static boolean uniqueSolution(Chromosome chromosome)
        Determines if the solution to the eight queens puzzle is unique if so returns true.
        Parameters:
        chromosome - The potential unique solution chromosome
        Returns:
        True if the chromosome is a unique solution

      • similarChromosomes

        public static java.lang.Double similarChromosomes(java.util.ArrayList<Chromosome> chromosomes)
        Calculates the percentage of chromosomes that are similar, this is an indication about how much in-breeding has occurred.
        Returns:
        Percentage of the number of chromosomes that are similar
